title: Riot how long till you fix the fullscreen bug?
body:
I've had this stupid problem for the past 3 patches where i can't play on full-screen mode and being forced to switch to borderless causing fps drop and spikes and they said they're "working on a fix".
it's already a new patch and they still didn't fix anything nor spoke of this bug as if it doesn't exist at all
i've been writing threads and submitting bug reports for the past month and riot clearly doesn't give a damn about me and the rest of the people suffering from this issue. will u atleast say if it'll get fixed at all?
please don't make me hate this community any more.

replies.body: Assuming you're referring to the "out of signal" issue, it should have been resolved for most players.  If you're still getting this problem and having to use Alt+Enter as a workaround, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you individually to find out what the deal is.  We'll reply back asap!
